item.title: The Concept of Motivation:How to Always Get Things Done
item.description: Motivation has a shelf life. It changes like the weather. Although it is a seasonal phenomenon, it still carries a great deal of power. In this blog post, I aim to explain how you can motivate yourself to do hard habits, even though you may feel low. Step One: Genuinely be interested in whatever you want to pursue. You cannot be internally motivated to do anything when you do not like doing it.
